sentences.en: A family doctor will be able to advise on suitable birth control.
sentences.cn: 家庭医生能够就合适的节育措施提出建议。

sentences.en: He was, indubitably, the most suitable candidate.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是最合适的人选。

sentences.en: I don't think I should be suitable for the post.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个岗位对我不合适.

sentences.en: It was only suitable for children.
Retailers have a statutory duty to provide goods suitable for their purpose.
sentences.cn: 零售商有为他们提供符合要求的货品的法定义务.

sentences.en: She rifled through her clothes for something suitable to wear.
sentences.cn: 她急匆匆地在衣服堆里找合适的衣服穿。

sentences.en: She seems eminently suitable for the job.
sentences.cn: 她看来非常适合这个工作。

sentences.en: The authority must make suitable accommodation available to the family.
sentences.cn: 当局必须给这个家庭提供适当的食宿条件。

sentences.en: The foreign ministers have thrashed out a suitable compromise formula.
sentences.cn: 外交部长们经过反复讨论，已经制订出合适的折中方案。

sentences.en: The old idea that this work was not suitable for women was no longer tenable.
sentences.cn: 认为这种工作不适合妇女的旧想法再也站不住脚了。

sentences.en: They don't think this article is suitable for publication.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这篇文章不宜发表.

sentences.en: They'd soon be penniless and homeless if she couldn't find suitable work.
sentences.cn: 她要找不到合适的工作，他们很快就会身无分文，无家可归。

sentences.en: This programme is not suitable for children.
We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.cn: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

sentences.en: We are trying to compile a list of suitable people for the job.
sentences.cn: 我们在努力编制一份适合做这项工作的人员名单。

sentences.en: When setting out on a long walk, always wear suitable boots.
sentences.cn: 每次出发远行，都要穿合适的鞋子。

words.tran_cn: 适宜；相配；供给…衣服（suit的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation
